sentence: Tā huè shuō huáyǔ
english_sentence: He speaks chinese

sentence: Zhè liǎngzhī bǐ yíyàng
english_sentence: These two pens are indentical

sentence: Zhèijiàn yīfù yànzi hěn hǎokàn
english_sentence: The pattern of this outfit is very beautiful

sentence: Shìjièshàng zuì gāode dàlóu zài nǎlǐ
english_sentence: Where is the tallest building in the world?

sentence: Shìjièshàng zuì nánxuéde yǔyán shì něiguó huà
english_sentence: Wich country has the world's most difficult language to learn?

sentence: Huáyǔde yǔfá bùnán
english_sentence: Chinese grammar is not difficult

sentence: Tā shūode zhèige bànfǎn búcuò
english_sentence: The method he just stated is pretty good

sentence: Qǐng nǐ bǐyibǐ zhè liǎngge dìfāngde tiānqì
english_sentence: Please compare the climate of there two areas

sentence: Wǒ gēn wǒ fùqīn hén xiàng
english_sentence: I'm a lot like my father

sentence: Wǒ yíqiè dōu hǎo, qǐng nín fàngxīn
english_sentence: I'm completely fine, please relax

sentence: Tā hǎoxiàng hěn gāoxǐng
english_sentence: He seems very happy

sentence: Tiānqì tài rè, wǒ chīde hěn shǎo, sǔoyǐ shòule
english_sentence: The wheather is too hot, I've been eating less so Ihave become  thinner

sentence: Jīntiān hǎoxiàng bǐjiào lěng
english_sentence: Seems like it's colder today

sentence: Tā érzi jīnnián shì suì le
english_sentence: This year his son  is ten years old

sentence: Nèige xuèshēng gōngkè hěn hǎo
english_sentence: That student's homework is very good

sentence: Cōngmíng de xuěshēng gōngkè dōu hǎo ma?
english_sentence: Do intelligent students always do well in their homework?

sentence: Lǎoshī xǐhuān yònggōng de xuéshēng
english_sentence: Teachers like hard working students

sentence: Tā fùmǔ niánjì dōu dàle
english_sentence: Both of his parents are old

sentence: Wàimiàn rède bùdéliǎo
english_sentence: It is extremely hot outside

sentence: Zhèige cài hěn hǎochī. nèige cài gèng hǎocì
english_sentence: This dish is delicious,(but) that dish is even better

sentence: Nèige rèn shòujíle
english_sentence: That person is extremely thin

sentence: Tā yǐqián hěn shòu, xiànzài pàngle
english_sentence: Before he was very thin, now he's become fat

sentence: Zhèitiào hě bǐ něitiào cháng
english_sentence: This river is longer than that one

sentence: Nà liǎngge rén, yíge gāo,yíge ǎi
english_sentence: Of those two people, one is tall, the other is short

sentence: Zhèijiàn yīfú bǐ nèijiàn cháng shí gōngfēn
english_sentence: This outfit is ten centimeters longer than that one

sentence: Tā měicì xiěde xìn dōu hěn duǎn
english_sentence: Every letter he writes is very short
